 Extensive background in .Net, C#, Asp.net, .net core, Javascript, Angular 2/4/5, React 2+ production experience with React and Angular 2/4/5 Strong work expereince in New development projects Proficient in Front-end technologies(Javascript, jQuery, Angular2/4/5, or React)   Good communication and team skills Experience in a Saas environment Computer Science Degree (BS/MS) or a related-field Good understanding of Agile Scrum, with experience working in an Agile setting Excellent written and oral communication skills, with some level of experience working closely with business teams 100% .Net 50% Hands On 50% Team Collaboration Competitive Salary: Up to $120,000/year, DOE Statutory Vacation Holiday Pay Karla Martinez-Silva Recruiter Workbridge Toronto - SWD Workbridge Associates

 July 18, 2018 $100-120K DOE Toronto, ON  .Net 
A product based company in downtown Toronto is seeking a Senior Full-stack .Net Developer for a fulltime position. They are looking for a candidate with extensive production experience with .Net, C#, Asp.net, .Net core, Javascript, Angular 2/4/5, and React. This is an opportunity to work with cutting edge tech, new development, and a great environment.
Required Skills & Experience
Extensive background in .Net, C#, Asp.net, .net core, Javascript, Angular 2/4/5, React
2+ production experience with React and Angular 2/4/5
Strong work expereince in New development projects
Proficient in Front-end technologies(Javascript, jQuery, Angular2/4/5, or React)  
Good communication and team skills
Experience in a Saas environment
Desired Skills & Experience
Computer Science Degree (BS/MS) or a related-field
Good understanding of Agile Scrum, with experience working in an Agile setting
Excellent written and oral communication skills, with some level of experience working closely with business teams
What You Will Be Doing
Tech Breakdown
100% .Net
Daily Responsibilities
50% Hands On
50% Team Collaboration
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $120,000/year, DOE
You will receive the following benefits:
Statutory Vacation
Holiday Pay
 
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis now and in the future.
This position does not offer sponsorship.
 
Workbridge Associates, part of the Motion Recruitment network, provides IT Staffing Solutions (Contract, Contract-to-Hire, and Direct Hire) across 11 major North American markets. Our unique expertise in today’s highest demand tech skill sets, paired with our deep networks and knowledge of our local technology markets, results in an exemplary track record with candidates and clients.
 A product based company in downtown Toronto is seeking a Senior Full-stack .Net Developer for a fulltime position. They are looking for a candidate with extensive production experience with .Net, C#, Asp.net, .Net core, Javascript, Angular 2/4/5, and React. This is an opportunity to work with cutting edge tech, new development, and a great environment.
